question: Which of the following condition will be true for a planet to have atmosphere?
option1: velocity of molecules in its atmosphere is lesser than escape velocity
option2: velocity of molecules in its atmosphere is greater than escape velocity
option3: velocity of molecules in its atmosphere is twice the escape velocity
option4: velocity of molecules in its atmosphere is equal to the escape velocity
answer: velocity of molecules in its atmosphere is lesser than escape velocity
explanation: A planet will have atmosphere if the velocity of molecule in its atmosphere is lesser than escape velocity. This is why earth has atmosphere while moon has no atmosphere.
